nodes.text: The Emerald Ocean was located on the Core World Chandrila. A shuttle service that operated out of the Chandrilan city of Emita crossed the ocean to reach Hanna City, Chandrila's capital.

The Emerald Ocean was introduced in the 2015 Star Wars Roleplaying expansion Strongholds of Resistance, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games as part of its Star Wars: Age of Rebellion roleplaying game.
